Test record 1
CPCD000BDX-E
基礎情報業績・財務情報ステークホルダー
基礎情報
会社名1st Source Corporation国籍United States
コード・
上場市場		SRCE NASISINUS3369011032
日経
会社コード		設立年1971
産業Finance業種Regional Banks
本社所在地100 North Michigan Street, South Bend, Indiana, 46601, United States従業員数1,100 人
URLhttp://www.1stsource.com
事業内容
事業内容1st Source Corp. operates as a bank holding company for 1st Source Bank. The company provides financial products and services through its subsidiaries. The bank offers commercial & consumer banking services, trust & investment management services and insurance to individuals and businesses. It provides commercial, small business, agricultural and real estate loans, including financing for industrial & commercial properties, financing for equipment, inventories & accounts receivables and acquisition financing. 1st Source Bank's consumer banking services include checking & savings accounts, certificates of deposits and individual retirement accounts; and offers a full line of on-line and mobile banking products for bill payment. It also provides trust, investment, agency and custodial services for individual, corporate and not-for-profit clients. The bank's specialty finance group services include equipment loan and lease finance products for auto & light trucks, medium & heavy duty trucks, new & used aircraft and construction & environmental equipment. The company was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in South Bend, IN.
日経NEEDS
業種		地方銀行

CPCD000BFS-E
基礎情報業績・財務情報ステークホルダー
基礎情報
会社名AAR CORP.国籍United States
コード・
上場市場		AIR NYSISINUS0003611052
日経
会社コード		設立年1951
産業Electronic Technology業種Aerospace & Defense
本社所在地One AAR Place, 1100 North Wood Dale Road, Wood Dale, Illinois, 60191, United States従業員数4,850 人
URLhttp://www.aarcorp.com
事業内容
事業内容AAR Corp. provides products and services to commercial aviation and government/defense industries. The company operates through two business segments: Aviation Services and Technology Products. The Aviation Services segment provides inventory management distribution, overhaul, repair, engineering and expeditionary airlift services for the commercial aviation, government and defense markets. The Technology Products segment engages in the design, manufacture, repair of airdrop and other transportation pallets, also provides a wide variety of containers and shelters used in support of military and humanitarian tactical deployment activities. The company was founded by Ira A. Eichner in 1951 and is headquartered in Wood Dale, IL.
日経NEEDS
業種		航空機関連品・部品

Test record 3
CPCD000BFT-E
基礎情報業績・財務情報ステークホルダー
基礎情報
会社名Aaron's, Inc.国籍United States
コード・
上場市場		AAN NYSISINUS0025353006
日経
会社コード		設立年1955
産業Finance業種Finance/Rental/Leasing
本社所在地309 East Paces Ferry Road NE, Atlanta, Georgia, 30305-2377, United States従業員数12,400 人
URLhttp://www.aarons.com
事業内容
事業内容Aaron's, Inc. retails consumer electronics, computers, residential furniture, household appliances and accessories. It engages in the lease ownership, lease and retail sale of products such as widescreen and LCD televisions, computers, living room, dining room and bedroom furniture, washers, dryers and refrigerators. The company operates through five segments: Sales & Lease Ownership, Progressive, HomeSmart, Franchise and Manufacturing. The Sales & Lease Ownership segment offers electronics, furniture, appliances and computers to consumers primarily on a monthly payment basis with no credit requirements. The Progressive segment offer a lease-purchase option for customers to acquire goods. The HomeSmart segment offer electronics, furniture, appliances and computers to consumers on a weekly payment basis with no credit requirements. The Franchise segment awards franchises and supports franchisees of sales and lease ownership concept. The Manufacturing segment manufactures upholstered furniture and bedding. The company was founded by R. Charles Loudermilk, Sr. in 1955 and is headquartered in Atlanta, GA.
日経NEEDS
業種		家具・インテリアショップ

Test record 4
CPCD000BG2-E
基礎情報業績・財務情報ステークホルダー
基礎情報
会社名Abbott Laboratories国籍United States
コード・
上場市場		ABT NYSISINUS0028241000
日経
会社コード		設立年1888
産業Health Technology業種Medical Specialties
本社所在地100 Abbott Park Road, Abbott Park, Illinois, 60064-6400, United States従業員数77,000 人
URLhttp://www.abbott.com
事業内容
事業内容Abbott Laboratories engages in the discovery, development, manufacture and sale of a broad and diversified line of health care products. The company operates through four reportable segments: Established Pharmaceutical Products, Diagnostic Products, Nutritional Products and Vascular Products. The Established Pharmaceutical Products segment includes branded generic pharmaceuticals manufactured, marketed and sold outside the United States and are generally sold directly to wholesalers, distributors, government agencies, health care facilities, specialty pharmacies, and independent retailers from its owned distribution centers and public warehouses, depending on the market served. The Diagnostic Products segment includes diagnostic systems and tests manufactured, marketed, and sold worldwide to blood banks, hospitals, commercial laboratories, clinics, physicians' offices, government agencies, alternate-care testing sites, and plasma protein therapeutic companies. The segment's products are generally marketed and sold directly from Abbott-owned distribution centers, public warehouses and third-party distributors. The Nutritional Products segment includes pediatric and adult nutritional products manufactured, marketed, and sold worldwide. Its products are generally marketed and sold directly to customers and to institutions, wholesalers, retailers, health care facilities, government agencies, and third-party distributors from owned distribution centers or third-party distributors. The Vascular Products segment includes coronary, endovascular, vessel closure, and structural heart devices for the treatment of vascular disease manufactured, marketed and sold worldwide. The segment's products are generally marketed and sold directly to hospitals from Abbott-owned distribution centers and public warehouses. Abbott Laboratories was founded by Wallace Calvin Abbott in 1888 and is headquartered in Abbott Park, IL.
日経NEEDS
業種		医療用医薬品、医療用試薬・検査薬、健康・栄養・機能性食品

基礎情報業績・財務情報ステークホルダー
基礎情報
会社名Ameris Bancorp国籍United States
コード・
上場市場		ABCB NASISINUS03076K1088
日経
会社コード		設立年1980
産業Finance業種Regional Banks
本社所在地24 Second Avenue, Moultrie, Georgia, 31768, United States従業員数1,027 人
URLhttp://www.amerisbank.com
事業内容
事業内容Ameris Bancorp is a financial holding company whose business is conducted primarily through its wholly-owned banking subsidiary, Ameris Bank, which provides a full range of banking services to its retail and commercial customers. It also provides business and individual customers with a full range of products and services, including checking products, mortgage and refinancing solutions, treasury services, and investment options. The company operates through the following divisions: the Banking Division, the Mortgage Division and the SBA Division. The Banking division derives its revenues from the delivery of full service financial services to include commercial loans, consumer loans and deposit accounts. The Mortgage division derives its revenues from the origination, sales and servicing of one-to-four family residential mortgage loans. The SBA division derives its revenues from the origination, sales and servicing of SBA loans. Ameris Bancorp was founded on December 18, 1980 and is headquartered in Moultrie, GA.
日経NEEDS
業種		地方銀行

基礎情報業績・財務情報ステークホルダー
基礎情報
会社名ABIOMED, Inc.国籍United States
コード・
上場市場		ABMD NASISINUS0036541003
日経
会社コード		設立年1981
産業Health Technology業種Medical Specialties
本社所在地22 Cherry Hill Drive, Danvers, Massachusetts, 01923, United States従業員数589 人
URLhttp://www.abiomed.com
事業内容
事業内容ABIOMED, Inc. Manufactures cardiac support, recovery, and replacement devices. The company provides mechanical circulatory support devices and continuum of care to heart failure patients. It also develop, manufacture and market proprietary products that are designed to enable the heart to rest, heal and recover by improving blood flow and/or performing the pumping function of the heart. The company products are used in the cardiac catheterization lab, or cath lab, by interventional cardiologists and in the heart surgery suite by heart surgeons for patients who are in need of hemodynamic support prophylactically or emergently before, during or after angioplasty or heart surgery procedures. ABIOMED was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Danvers, MA.
日経NEEDS

基礎情報業績・財務情報ステークホルダー
基礎情報
会社名ABM Industries Incorporated国籍United States
コード・
上場市場		ABM NYSISINUS0009571003
日経
会社コード		設立年1909
産業Commercial Services業種Miscellaneous Commercial Services
本社所在地551 Fifth Avenue, Suite 300, New York, New York, 10176, United States従業員数118,000 人
URLhttp://www.abm.com
事業内容
事業内容ABM Industries, Inc. provides facility services for commercial, industrial and institutional buildings. The company operates its business through six segments: Janitorial, Facility services, Parking, Security, Building & Energy Solutions and Other. The Janitorial segment provides a wide range of essential janitorial services for a variety of facilities, including commercial office buildings, educational institutions, government buildings, health facilities, industrial buildings, retail stores, shopping centers, stadiums and arenas, airports and other transportation centers, and warehouses. The Facility services segment provides onsite mechanical engineering and technical services and solutions for facilities and infrastructure systems for a variety of facilities, including commercial office buildings and infrastructure, data centers, educational institutions, high technology manufacturing facilities, museums, resorts, airports and other transportation centers, and shopping centers. The Parking segment provides parking and transportation services for clients at many facilities, including commercial office buildings, airports and other transportation centers, educational institutions, health facilities, hotels, municipalities, retail centers, and stadiums and arenas. The Security segment provides security services for clients in a wide range of facilities, including commercial office buildings and commercial, health, industrial, petro-chemical, residential, and retail facilities. The Building & Energy Solutions segment provides custom energy solutions, HVAC, electrical, lighting and other general maintenance and repair services. The Other segment provides air service facility solutions to clients, such as passenger assistance, including wheelchair operations, aircraft cabin cleaning, janitorial services, shuttle bus operations, and access control. ABM Industries was founded in 1909 and is headquartered in New York, NY.
日経NEEDS
業種		不動産管理・ビルメンテナンス

会社名Abraxas Petroleum Corporation国籍United States
コード・

産業Energy Minerals業種Oil & Gas Production
本社所在地18803 Meisner Drive, San Antonio, Texas, 78258, United States従業員数123 人
URLhttp://www.abraxaspetroleum.com
事業内容
事業内容Abraxas Petroleum Corp. is an independent energy company. It engages in the acquisition, exploration, development and production of crude oil and natural gas in the United States and Canada. The company has operations across the Rocky Mountain, Permian Basin and onshore Gulf Coast regions of the United States. Abraxas Petroleum was founded by Robert L.G. Watson in 1977 and is headquartered in San Antonio, TX.

基礎情報業績・財務情報ステークホルダー
基礎情報
会社名ACE Limited国籍Switzerland
コード・
上場市場		ACE NYSISINCH0044328745
日経
会社コード		設立年1985
産業Finance業種Property/Casualty Insurance
本社所在地Bärengasse 32, Zurich, Zurich, 8001, Switzerland従業員数21,000 人
URLhttp://www.acegroup.com
事業内容
事業内容ACE Limited operates as an holding company, which provides commercial property and casualty insurance, and reinsurance products and services. It operates through the following segments: Insurance-North American P&C, Insurance-North American Agriculture, Insurance-Overseas General, Global Reinsurance and Life. The Insurance-North American P&C segment has five operating businesses: ACE USA, ACE Westchester, ACE Bermuda, ACE Private Risk Services and ACE Commercial Risk Services. The ACE USA business distributes coverage through retail brokers and provides a broad array of specialty property, casualty, and accident and health insurance products and risk management services to corporate clients across the U.S. and Canada. The ACE Westchester business is specialized in excess and surplus lines specialty products, including crop insurance and specialty agribusiness coverage distributed through independent agents, as well as property, inland marine, casualty, professional lines, and environmental liability products distributed through wholesale brokers. The ACE Bermuda business writes excess liability, property, political risk and directors and officers insurance worldwide. The ACE Private Risk Services business provides high net worth individuals and families with homeowners, automobile, valuables, umbrella and recreational marine insurance. The ACE Commercial Risk Services business offers specialty insurance products and solutions for small businesses through several distribution channels. The Insurance-North American Agriculture segment comprises the North American based businesses that provide a variety of coverages in the U.S. and Canada including crop insurance, primarily Multiple Peril Crop Insurance and crop-hail through Rain and Hail Insurance Services, Inc. as well as farm and ranch, and specialty P&C commercial insurance products and services through the ACE Agribusiness unit. The Insurance-Overseas General segment has the following businesses: ACE International and ACE Global Markets. The ACE International business engages in the retail broker-distributed business outside of North America. The ACE Global Markets business is a London-based excess and surplus lines business that includes a syndicate on the Lloyd's trading floor. These businesses write a variety of coverage, including property, casualty, professional lines, marine, energy, aviation, political risk, construction risk, accident and health and specialty consumer-oriented products. This business also includes the international operations of Combined Insurance, which provides specialty accident and supplemental health insurance products to middle-income consumers in Europe, Latin America and Asia Pacific. The Global Reinsurance segment provides solutions for customers ranging from small commercial insured to multinational ceding companies. It offers products, such as property and workers' compensation catastrophe, directors and officers, professional liability, specialty casualty and specialty property. The Life segment has business, including ACE Life, which provides traditional life insurance protection and savings products to meet the needs of individuals and groups in a growing number of countries throughout Asia, Latin America and the Middle East; Combined Insurance that distributes specialty individual accident and supplemental health and life insurance products targeted to middle income consumers in the U.S. and Canada; and ACE Tempest Life Re, which provides specialty life reinsurance products to life insurers. ACE was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Zurich, Switzerland.
日経NEEDS
業種		損害保険、生命保険

基礎情報業績・財務情報ステークホルダー
基礎情報
会社名Aceto Corporation国籍United States
コード・
上場市場		ACET NASISINUS0044461004
日経
会社コード		設立年1947
産業Process Industries業種Chemicals: Specialty
本社所在地4 Tri Harbor Court, Port Washington, New York, 11050, United States従業員数270 人
URLhttp://www.aceto.com
事業内容
事業内容Aceto Corp. is engaged in the marketing, sales and distribution of pharmaceutical active ingredients and intermediates, finished dosage form generic pharmaceuticals, nutraceutical products, agricultural protection products and specialty chemicals. The company operates through there segments: Human Health, Pharmaceutical Ingredients and Performance Chemicals. The Human Health segment includes finished dosage form generic drugs and nutraceutical products. It supplies the raw materials used in the production of nutritional and packaged dietary supplements, including vitamins, amino acids, iron compounds and biochemicals used in pharmaceutical and nutritional preparations. The Pharmaceutical Ingredients segment consists of two product groups: Active Pharmaceutical Ingredients (APIs) and Pharmaceutical Intermediates. The Performance Chemicals segment consists of two product groups: Specialty Chemicals and Agriculture Protection products. The Specialty chemicals includes a variety of chemicals which make plastics, surface coatings, textiles, fuels and lubricants perform to their designed capabilities. Its dye and pigment intermediates are used in the color-producing industries such as textiles, inks, paper, and coatings. This segment's organic intermediates are used in the production of agrochemicals. It also supplies diazos and couplers to the paper, film and electronics industries. The Agriculture protection products includes herbicides, fungicides and insecticides that control weed growth as well as control the spread of insects and other microorganisms that can severely damage plant growth. This segment also includes a sprout inhibitor for potatoes and an herbicide for sugar cane. Aceto was founded in 1947 and is headquartered in Port Washington, NY.
日経NEEDS
業種		医薬品原体・中間体、医薬品原体・中間体、化学品・工業薬品、酸化チタン・酸化鉄、農薬・殺虫剤、後発医薬品

基礎情報業績・財務情報ステークホルダー
基礎情報
会社名Acmat Corporation Class A国籍United States
コード・
上場市場		ACMTA OTCISINUS0046162071
日経
会社コード		設立年1950
産業Finance業種Property/Casualty Insurance
本社所在地30 South Road, Farmington, Connecticut, 06032, United States従業員数
URLhttp://www.acmatcorp.com
事業内容
事業内容ACMAT Corp. operates as a holding company. It provides surety bonds for prime, sub-prime, specialty trade, environmental, asbestos and lead abatement contractors and miscellaneous obligations. The company also provides miscellaneous surety such as workers compensation bonds, supply bonds, subdivision bonds, and license and permit bonds. It operates through its subsidiary, ACSTAR Insurance Co. The company was founded by Henry W. Nozko, Sr. in 1950 and is headquartered in Farmington, CT.

会社名Acme United Corporation国籍United States
コード・

産業Consumer Durables業種Tools & Hardware
本社所在地55 Walls Drive, Suite 201, Fairfield, Connecticut, 06824, United States従業員数303 人
URLhttp://www.acmeunited.com
事業内容
事業内容Acme United Corp. engages in the supply cutting devices, measuring and first aid products to the school, home, office, hardware, sporting goods and industrial markets. The company's principal products across all segments are scissors, shears, knives, rulers, pencil sharpeners, lettering products and math tools. It markets and sells its products under various brands such as Westcott, Clauss, Camillus, PhysiciansCare and Pac-Kit. The company was founded in 1867 and is headquartered in Fairfield, CT.

基礎情報業績・財務情報ステークホルダー
基礎情報
会社名ACNB Corporation国籍United States
コード・
上場市場		ACNB NASISINUS0008681092
日経
会社コード		設立年1982
産業Finance業種Regional Banks
本社所在地16 Lincoln Square, Gettysburg, Pennsylvania, 17325-2205, United States従業員数297 人
URLhttp://www.acnb.com
事業内容
事業内容ACNB Corp. operates as a bank holding company for ACNB Bank, which provides a full range of banking and financial services to individuals and businesses, including commercial and retail banking, trust and investment management, and insurance through its banking and nonbanking subsidiaries. Its commercial lending services include commercial mortgages, real estate development and construction, accounts receivable and inventory financing, and agricultural loans. The company's consumer lending programs include home equity loans and lines of credit, automobile and recreational vehicle loans, manufactured housing loans, and personal lines of credit. Its mortgage lending programs include personal residential mortgages, residential construction loans, and investment mortgage loans. It offers deposit, online banking, online bill payment and presentment, telephone banking, debit cards cash management, merchant services, consumer, student, auto, home equity, mortgage and business loans. The company was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Gettysburg, PA.

基礎情報
会社名Acxiom Corporation国籍United States
コード・
上場市場		ACXM NASISINUS0051251090
日経
会社コード		設立年1969
産業Commercial Services業種Advertising/Marketing Services
本社所在地601 East 3rd Street, Little Rock, Arkansas, 72201-1709, United States従業員数4,320 人
URLhttp://www.acxiom.com
事業内容
事業内容Acxiom Corp. is engaged in marketing database and business intelligence development. It operates through the following segments: Marketing and Data Services, Information Technology (IT) Infrastructure Management, and Other Services. The Marketing and Data Services segment consists of customer data integration, consumer insight solutions, marketing management services, and consulting and agency services. The IT Infrastructure Management segment develops and provides IT outsourcing and transformational solutions. The Other Services segment includes e-mail fulfillment, United States risk and United Kingdom fulfillment businesses. The company was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Little Rock, AR.

事業内容
事業内容Adams Resources & Energy, Inc. engages in the business of marketing crude oil, and natural gas, as well as tank truck transportation of liquid chemicals and oil and gas exploration and production. It operates through the following subsidiaries: Gulfmark Energy, Inc., Adams Resources Exploration Corporation, Service Transport Company. Adams Resources & Energy was founded by Kenneth Stanley Adams, Jr. in 1947 and is headquartered in Houston, TX.

基礎情報業績・財務情報ステークホルダー
基礎情報
会社名Adobe Systems Incorporated国籍United States
コード・
上場市場		ADBE NASISINUS00724F1012
日経
会社コード		設立年1982
産業Technology Services業種Packaged Software
本社所在地345 Park Avenue, San Jose, California, 95110-2704, United States従業員数12,499 人
URLhttp://www.adobe.com
事業内容
事業内容Adobe Systems, Inc. provides digital marketing and digital media solutions. The company operates its business through three segments: Digital Media, Digital Marketing, and Print and Publishing. The Digital Media segment offers creative cloud services, which allow members to download and install the latest versions of products, such as Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe Photoshop Lightroom and Adobe InDesign, as well as utilize other tools, such as Adobe Acrobat. This segment also offers other tools and services, including hobbyist products, such as Adobe Photoshop Elements and Adobe Premiere Elements, Adobe Digital Publishing Suite, Adobe PhoneGap, Adobe Typekit, as well as mobile apps, such as Adobe Photoshop Mix, Adobe Photoshop Sketch and Adobe Premiere Clip that run on tablets and mobile devices. The Digital Media serves professionals, including graphic designers, production artists, web designers and developers, user interface designers, videographers, motion graphic artists, prepress professionals, video game developers, mobile application developers, students and administrators. The Digital Marketing segment offers various solutions, including analytics, social marketing, targeting, media optimization, digital experience management and cross-channel campaign management, as well as premium video delivery and monetization. This segment also offers legacy enterprise software, such as Adobe Connect web conferencing platform and Adobe LiveCycle. The Print and Publishing segment offers legacy products and services for eLearning solutions, technical document publishing, web application development and high-end printing. Adobe Systems was founded by Charles M. Geschke and John E. Warnock in December 1982 and is headquartered in San Jose, CA.
日経NEEDS
業種		パッケージソフト（一般向け・汎用ソフト）、ネット広告（ネットマーケティング支援）

会社名Advanced Environmental Recycling Technologies, Inc. Class A国籍United States
コード・
上場市場		AERT OTCISINUS0079471043
日経
会社コード		設立年1988
産業Producer Manufacturing業種Building Products
本社所在地914 North Jefferson Street, Springdale, Arkansas, 72764-3400, United States従業員数397 人
URLhttp://www.aertinc.com
事業内容
事業内容Advanced Environmental Recycling Technologies, Inc. develops and commercializes technologies to recycle waste polyethylene plastics and develops, manufactures, and markets value-added, green building compounds. Its primary products are composite building materials that are used in place of traditional wood or plastic products for exterior applications in building and remodeling homes and for certain other industrial or commercial building purposes. The company operates a new green-age plastic recycling, cleaning and reformulation facility at Watts, Oklahoma. Advanced Environmental Recycling Technologies was founded by Joe G. Brooks in December 1988 and is headquartered in Springdale, AR.

業種		建築材料（樹脂・ゴム）

基礎情報業績・財務情報ステークホルダー
基礎情報
会社名Advanced Micro Devices, Inc.国籍United States
コード・
上場市場		AMD NASISINUS0079031078
日経
会社コード		設立年1969
産業Electronic Technology業種Semiconductors
本社所在地One AMD Place, Sunnyvale, California, 94088-3905, United States従業員数9,700 人
URLhttp://www.amd.com
事業内容
事業内容Advanced Micro Devices, Inc. is a global semiconductor company that develops computer processors and related technologies for business and consumer markets. It design and integrate technology for intelligent devices, including personal computers, game consoles and cloud servers. The company operates through two business segments: Computing and Graphics Solutions, and Enterprise, Embedded and Semi-Custom. The Computing and Graphics segment includes desktop, notebook processors, chipsets, discrete GPUs and professional graphics. The Enterprise, Embedded and Semi-Custom segment includes server and embedded processors, dense servers, semi-custom SoC products, engineering services and royalties. Advanced Micro Devices was founded by W. J. Sanders III and David John Carey on May 1, 1969 and is headquartered in Sunnyvale, CA.
日経NEEDS
業種		半導体（集積回路・半導体素子）、パーソナルコンピューター・周辺機器

基礎情報
会社名Heron Therapeutics Inc国籍United States
コード・
上場市場		HRTX NASISINUS4277461020
日経
会社コード		設立年1983
産業Health Technology業種Biotechnology
本社所在地123 Saginaw Drive, Redwood City, California, 94063, United States従業員数59 人
URLhttp://www.herontx.com
事業内容
事業内容Heron Therapeutics, Inc. is a pharmaceutical company. It designs and commercializes of polymer technologies for pharmaceutical and other applications. The company develops products using its proprietary Biochronomer polymer based drug delivery technology. Its primary focus is on its product APF530, for the prevention of chemotherapy induced nausea and vomiting. The company has additional clinical and preclinical-stage programs in the area of pain management, all of which utilize its bioerodible, injectable and implantable delivery systems. Its Biochronomer technology is applicable to a range of therapeutics areas, including prevention of nausea and vomiting, pain management, control of inflammation and treatment of ophthalmic diseases. The company was founded in February 1983 and is headquartered in Redwood City, CA

事業内容Diversicare Healthcare Services, Inc. provides long-term care services to nursing center patients in nine states primarily in the Southeast and Southwest. It provides a range of health care services such as nursing, personal care and social services in long-term care centers and also offers a variety of comprehensive rehabilitation services as well as nutritional support services. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Brentwood, TN.

基礎情報業績・財務情報ステークホルダー
基礎情報
会社名AEP Industries Inc.国籍United States
コード・
上場市場		AEPI NASISINUS0010311035
日経
会社コード		設立年1970
産業Process Industries業種Containers/Packaging
本社所在地95 Chestnut Ridge Road, Montvale, New Jersey, 07645, United States従業員数2,500 人
URLhttp://www.aepinc.com
事業内容
事業内容AEP Industries, Inc. is a manufacturer of plastic packaging films in North America. It manufactures and markets an extensive and diverse line of polyethylene and polyvinyl chloride flexible packaging products, with consumer, industrial and agricultural applications. The company plastic packaging films are used in the packaging, transportation, beverage, food, automotive, pharmaceutical, chemical, electronics, construction, agriculture and textile industries. It manufactures both industrial grade products, which are manufactured to general industry specifications, and specialty products, which are manufactured under more exacting standards to assure certain required chemical and physical properties. AEP Industries was founded by J. Brendan Barba in January 1970 and is headquartered in Montvale, NJ.
日経NEEDS
業種		包装・梱包資材

事業内容
事業内容ATRM Holdings, Inc. manufactures modular buildings for commercial and residential applications. It also offers products for both commercial and residential buildings, with customization to suit the project requirements, to customers including builders, general contractors and owners of commercial buildings. The company was founded in December 1982 and is headquartered in Mahtomedi, MN.

基礎情報業績・財務情報ステークホルダー
基礎情報
会社名Aflac Incorporated国籍United States
コード・
上場市場		AFL NYSISINUS0010551028
日経
会社コード		設立年1955
産業Finance業種Life/Health Insurance
本社所在地1932 Wynnton Road, Columbus, Georgia, 31999, United States従業員数9,235 人
URLhttp://www.aflac.com
事業内容
事業内容Aflac, Inc. is a general business holding company and acts as a management company, overseeing the operations of its subsidiaries by providing management services and making capital available. Its principal business is supplemental health and life insurance, which is marketed and administered through its subsidiary, American Family Life Assurance of Columbus, which operates in the United States and as a branch in Japan. The company operates business through two segments Aflac Japan and Aflac U.S. The Aflac Japan segment provides death benefits and cash surrender values, WAYS product, have features that allow policyholders to convert a portion of their life insurance to medical, nursing care, or fixed annuity benefits at a predetermined age and child endowment product. It also sells voluntary supplemental insurance products, including cancer plans, general medical indemnity plans, medical/sickness riders, care plans, living benefit life plans, ordinary life insurance plans and annuities. The Aflac U.S. segment sells voluntary supplemental insurance products including products designed to protect individuals from depletion of assets and loss-of-income products. Aflac was founded by John Amos, Daniel Paul Amos and William Amos on November 17, 1955 and is headquartered in Columbus, GA.
日経NEEDS

基礎情報業績・財務情報ステークホルダー
基礎情報
会社名AGCO Corporation国籍United States
コード・
上場市場		AGCO NYSISINUS0010841023
日経
会社コード		設立年1990
産業Producer Manufacturing業種Trucks/Construction/Farm Machinery
本社所在地4205 River Green Parkway, Duluth, Georgia, 30096-2563, United States従業員数20,800 人
URLhttp://www.agcocorp.com
事業内容
事業内容AGCO Corp. engages in global manufacturing and distribution of agricultural equipment and related replacement parts. It designs, manufactures and distributes grain storage, handling equipment and protein production systems. The company also provides retail financing through its retail finance joint ventures. It offers a full line of tractors, combines, hay tools, sprayers, and forage and tillage equipment and related replacement parts. The company's products are sold through five core brands, including Challenger, Fendt, Massey Ferguso, GSI and Valtra, which are distributed globally through independent dealers and distributors. AGCO markets and distributes farm equipment and replacement parts to farmers in all geographical segments through the network of independent dealers. The AGCO was founded by Robert J. Ratliff in 1990 and is headquartered in Duluth, GA.

基礎情報業績・財務情報ステークホルダー
基礎情報
会社名Agrium Inc.国籍Canada
コード・
上場市場		AGU NYSISINCA0089161081
日経
会社コード		設立年1992
産業Process Industries業種Chemicals: Agricultural
本社所在地13131 Lake Fraser Drive SE, Calgary, Alberta, T2J 7E8, Canada従業員数15,500 人
URLhttp://www.agrium.com
事業内容
事業内容Agrium, Inc. is a retail supplier of agricultural products and services in North America, South America and Australia and a global wholesale producer and marketer of all three major agricultural nutrients and the premier supplier of specialty fertilizers in North America. The company operates two core strategic business units: Retail and Wholesale. The Retail business unit markets crop nutrients, crop protection products, seed, merchandise, application and other agronomic services through its retail locations in the United States, Canada, Australia, Argentina, Chile, Brazil and Uruguay. The Wholesale business unit manufactures, purchases and markets a full range of nutrients including nitrogen-based, potash and phosphate-based crop nutrient products. The company was founded on December 21, 1992 and is headquartered in Calgary, Canada.
日経NEEDS
業種		肥料

基礎情報業績・財務情報ステークホルダー
基礎情報
会社名Air Methods Corporation国籍United States
コード・
上場市場		AIRM NASISINUS0091283079
日経
会社コード		設立年1980
産業Health Services業種Medical/Nursing Services
本社所在地7301 South Peoria, Englewood, Colorado, 80112-4114, United States従業員数4,556 人
URLhttp://www.airmethods.com
事業内容
事業内容Air Methods Corp. provides air medical transportation services throughout the United States and design, manufacture, and install medical aircraft interiors and other aerospace and medical transport products. It operates through three divisions: Air Medical Services, United Rotorcraft division and Tourism Division. The Air Medical Services division provides air medical transportation services to the general population as an independent service and to hospitals or other institutions under exclusive operating agreements. Its services include aircraft operation and maintenance, medical care, dispatch and communications, and medical billing and collection. The United Rotorcraft division designs, manufactures, and installs aircraft medical interiors and other aerospace and medical transport products for domestic and international customers. Tourism division provides helicopter tours and charter flights, primarily focusing on Grand Canyon and Hawaiian Island tours. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Englewood, CO.

基礎情報業績・財務情報ステークホルダー
基礎情報
会社名Air Products and Chemicals, Inc.国籍United States
コード・
上場市場		APD NYSISINUS0091581068
日経
会社コード		設立年1940
産業Process Industries業種Chemicals: Specialty
本社所在地7201 Hamilton Boulevard, Allentown, Pennsylvania, 18195-1501, United States従業員数21,200 人
URLhttp://www.airproducts.com
事業内容
事業内容Air Products & Chemicals, Inc. serves energy, electronics, chemicals, steel, and manufacturing customers globally with a unique portfolio of products, services, and solutions that include atmospheric gases, process and specialty gases, performance materials, equipment, and services. It also produces hydrogen, helium, and other industrial gases and chemicals. The company operates its business through four reportable segments: Merchant Gases, Tonnage Gases, Electronics and Performance Materials, and Equipment and Energy. The Merchant Gases segment sells atmospheric gases, such as oxygen, nitrogen, and argon; process gases such as hydrogen and helium; specialty gases; and certain services and equipment, throughout the world to customers in many industries, including those in metals, glass, chemical processing, food processing, healthcare, steel, general manufacturing, and petroleum and natural gas industries. The Tonnage Gases segment provides hydrogen, carbon monoxide, nitrogen, oxygen, and synthesis gas principally to the energy production and refining, chemical, and metallurgical industries worldwide. The Electronics and Performance Materials segment employs applications technology to provide solutions to a broad range of global industries through chemical synthesis, analytical technology, process engineering, and surface science. This segment provides specialty and tonnage gases, chemicals, services and equipment to the electronics industry primarily for the manufacture of silicon and compound semiconductors as well as liquid crystal (LCD) and other displays. It also provides performance chemical solutions for the coatings, inks, adhesives, civil engineering, personal care, institutional and industrial cleaning, mining, oil field, polyurethane and other industries. The Equipment and Energy segment designs and manufactures cryogenic and gas processing equipment for air separation, hydrocarbon recovery and purification, natural gas liquefaction and helium distribution and serves energy markets in a variety of ways. Air Products & Chemicals was founded by Leonard Parker Pool in 1940 and is headquartered in Allentown, PA.
日経NEEDS
業種		工業用ガス

基礎情報業績・財務情報ステークホルダー
基礎情報
会社名Airgas, Inc.国籍United States
コード・
上場市場		ARG NYSISINUS0093631028
日経
会社コード		設立年1982
産業Process Industries業種Chemicals: Specialty
本社所在地259 North Radnor-Chester Road, Suite 100, Radnor, Pennsylvania, 19087-5283, United States従業員数17,000 人
URLhttp://www.airgas.com
事業内容
事業内容Airgas, Inc. distributes industrial, medical and specialty gases and related hard goods in the U.S. The company operates its business through two segments: Distribution and All Other Operations. The Distribution segment primarily engages in the distribution of industrial, medical and specialty gases and hard goods and in the production of gases to supply the regional distribution companies. It offers atmospheric gases including nitrogen, oxygen, and argon; helium; hydrogen; welding and fuel gases, such as acetylene, propylene, and propane; carbon dioxide; nitrous oxide; various gases; special application blends; and process chemicals. The All Other Operations segment consists of six business units which primarily manufacture and/or distribute carbon dioxide, dry ice, nitrous oxide, ammonia and refrigerant gases. It also offers supply chain management services and solutions, and product and process technical support across many diverse customer segments. The company markets its products and services through multiple sales channels, including branch-based sales representatives, retail stores, strategic customer account programs, telesales, catalogs, eBusiness and independent distributors. Airgas was founded by Peter McCausland in 1982 and is headquartered in Radnor, PA.
日経NEEDS
業種		工業用ガス

基礎情報業績・財務情報ステークホルダー
基礎情報
会社名Fuel Systems Solutions, Inc.国籍United States
コード・
上場市場		FSYS NASISINUS35952W1036
日経
会社コード		設立年1958
産業Consumer Durables業種Automotive Aftermarket
本社所在地780 3d Avenue, 25th floor, New York, New York, 10017, United States従業員数1,500 人
URLhttp://www.fuelsystemssolutions.com
事業内容
事業内容Fuel Systems Solutions, Inc. designs, manufactures and supplies cost effective alternative fuel components and systems for transportation and industrial applications. Its systems control the pressure and flow of gaseous alternative fuels, such as propane and natural gas used in internal combustion engines. The company operates in two segments: FSS Industrial and FSS Automotive. The FSS Industrial segment consists of industrial mobile and stationary and auxiliary power unit, and the heavy duty commercial transportation operations. The FSS Automotive segment consists of the passenger and light duty commercial transportation, automotive aftermarket, and transportation infrastructure operations, as well as the U.S. Automotive unit. Fuel Systems Solutions was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in New York, NY.
日経NEEDS
業種		自動車部品（エンジンパーツ・補機類）、計測・分析機器、計測・分析機器

基礎情報
会社名AK Steel Holding Corporation国籍United States
コード・
上場市場		AKS NYSISINUS0015471081
日経
会社コード		設立年1993
産業Non-Energy Minerals業種Steel
本社所在地9227 Centre Point Drive, West Chester, Ohio, 45069, United States従業員数8,000 人
URLhttp://www.aksteel.com
事業内容
事業内容AK Steel Holding Corp. is an integrated producer of flat-rolled carbon, stainless and electrical steels and tubular products through its wholly-owned subsidiary, AK Steel Corp. The company's operations consist primarily of nine steelmaking and finishing plants and tubular production facilities located in Indiana, Kentucky, Ohio and Pennsylvania. Its operations include, producing flat-rolled value-added carbon steels, including premium-quality coated, cold-rolled and hot-rolled carbon steel products, and specialty stainless and electrical steels, as well as carbon and stainless steel. AK Steel Holding was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in West Chester, OH.

CPCD000BNP-E
基礎情報業績・財務情報ステークホルダー
基礎情報
会社名Akorn, Inc.国籍United States
コード・
上場市場		AKRX NASISINUS0097281069
日経
会社コード		設立年1971
産業Distribution Services業種Medical Distributors
本社所在地1925 West Field Court, Suite 300, Lake Forest, Illinois, 60045-4862, United States従業員数1,665 人
URLhttp://www.akorn.com
事業内容
事業内容Akorn, Inc. manufactures and markets a full line of diagnostic and therapeutic ophthalmic pharmaceuticals as well as niche hospital drugs and injectable pharmaceuticals. It also markets and distributes vaccines purchased from outside sources. The company customers include physicians, optometrists, hospitals, wholesalers, group purchasing organizations, retail pharmacy chains and other pharmaceutical companies. It operates through three segments: Ophthalmic, Hospital Drugs & Injectables and Contract Services. The Ophthalmic segment market a full line of diagnostic and therapeutic ophthalmic pharmaceutical products. The diagnostic products, primarily used in the office setting include mydriatics and cycloplegics, anesthetics, topical stains, gonioscopic solutions, angiography dyes and others. The therapeutic products, sold primarily to wholesalers, chain drug stores and other national account customers include antibiotics, steroids, steroid combinations, glaucoma medications, decongestants/antihistamines and anti-edema medications. The non-pharmaceutical products include various artificial tear solutions, preservative-free lubricating ointments and eyelid cleansers. The Hospital Drugs & Injectables segment markets a line of niche hospital drug and injectable pharmaceutical products, including antidotes, anti-infectives, controlled substances for pain management and anesthesia, and other selected pharmaceutical products. These products are predominately sold to hospitals through the wholesale distribution channel. The Contract Services segment manufactures ophthalmic and injectable pharmaceutical products for third party pharmaceutical customers based on their specifications. The company was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Lake Forest, IL.
日経NEEDS
業種		医薬品卸

産業Electronic Technology業種Telecommunications Equipment

URLhttp://www.alanco.com
事業内容
事業内容Alanco Technologies, Inc. is a development stage company. The company's subsidiary Alanco Energy Services, Inc. offers treatment and disposal facility for oil and gas produced water, located near Grand Junction, Western Colorado. Previously, it operated through three segments: Data Storage, Wireless Asset Management, and RFID Technology. The company was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Scottsdale, AZ.

基礎情報業績・財務情報ステークホルダー
基礎情報
会社名Alaska Air Group, Inc.国籍United States
コード・
上場市場		ALK NYSISINUS0116591092
日経
会社コード		設立年1985
産業Transportation業種Airlines
本社所在地19300 International Boulevard, Seattle, Washington, 98188-5304, United States従業員数13,952 人
URLhttp://www.alaskaair.com
事業内容
事業内容Alaska Air Group, Inc. operates as a holding company, which through its subsidiaries, Alaska Airlines, Inc. and Horizon Air Industries, Inc. provides air transportation services. It operates through three segments: Alaska Mainline, Alaska Regional and Horizon. The Alaska Mainline segment includes flying Boeing 737 jets and all associated revenues and costs. The Alaska Regional segment records actual on-board passenger revenue, less costs such as fuel, distribution costs, and payments made to Horizon, SkyWest and PenAir under the respective Capacity Purchase Agreements. The Horizon segment operates turboprop Q400 aircraft. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Seattle, WA.
日経NEEDS
業種		航空輸送

基礎情報業績・財務情報ステークホルダー
基礎情報
会社名Albany International Corp. Class A国籍United States
コード・
上場市場		AIN NYSISINUS0123481089
日経
会社コード		設立年1895
産業Process Industries業種Textiles
本社所在地216 Airport Drive, Rochester, New Hampshire, 03867, United States従業員数4,000 人
URLhttp://www.albint.com
事業内容
事業内容Albany International Corp. is a textiles and materials processing company. The company operates through two business segments: Machine Clothing and Engineered Composites. The Machine Clothing segment includes Paper Machine Clothing and Engineered Fabrics. Paper Machine Clothing consists of solution-focused, custom-designed fabrics and belts that are critical for the formation and transport of the paper sheet through the paper machine. Engineered Fabrics are utilized in processes outside of papermaking such as nonwovens, corrugators, the building products, tannery and textile industries. The Engineered Composites segment provides custom-designed advanced composite structures based on proprietary technology to customers in the aerospace and defense industries. Albany International was founded on March 8, 1895 and is headquartered in Rochester, NH.
日経NEEDS
業種		印刷・製紙機械

基礎情報業績・財務情報ステークホルダー
基礎情報
会社名Albemarle Corporation国籍United States
コード・
上場市場		ALB NYSISINUS0126531013
日経
会社コード		設立年1993
産業Process Industries業種Chemicals: Specialty
本社所在地451 Florida Street, Baton Rouge, Louisiana, 70801, United States従業員数3,625 人
URLhttp://www.albemarle.com
事業内容
事業内容Albemarle Corp. develops, manufactures and markets chemicals for consumer electronics, petroleum refining, utilities, packaging, construction, transportation, pharmaceuticals, crop production, food-safety and custom chemistry services. The company operates through three segments Performance Chemicals, Refining Solutions and Chemetall Surface Treatment. The Performance Chemicals segment includes lithium, aluminum alkyls and derivative catalysts businesses. The Refining Solutions segment consist of the heavy oil upgrading and clean fuels technologies businesses delivering a portfolio of catalyst solutions that apply to the entire refinery process. The Chemetall Surface Treatment segment supplies specialty chemicals with a focus on processes for the surface treatment of metals and plastics. Albemarle was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Baton Rouge, LA.
日経NEEDS
業種		化学品・工業薬品、工業用プラスチック製品

CPCD000BPP-E
基礎情報業績・財務情報ステークホルダー
基礎情報
会社名Alexander & Baldwin, Inc.国籍United States
コード・
上場市場		ALEX NYSISINUS0144911049
日経
会社コード		設立年1870
産業Finance業種Real Estate Development
本社所在地822 Bishop Street, Honolulu, Hawaii, 96813-3924, United States従業員数1,502 人
URLhttp://www.alexanderbaldwin.com
事業内容
事業内容Alexander & Baldwin, Inc. is a Hawaii-focused land company with interests in real estate development, real estate leasing and agribusiness. It operates through four segments: Real Estate Development and Sales, Real Estate Leasing, Materials and Construction, and Agribusiness. The Real Estate Development and Sales segments are engages in the real estate development and ownership activities, including planning, zoning, financing, constructing, purchasing, managing, leasing, selling, exchanging and investing in real property. Real estate activities are conducted through A&B Properties, Inc. and other wholly owned subsidiaries of the company. The Materials and Construction segment performs asphalt paving as prime contractor and subcontractor; imports and sells liquid asphalt; mines, processes and sells basalt aggregate; produces and sells asphaltic concrete; provides and sells various construction- and traffic-control-related products and manufactures and sells precast concrete products. The Agribusiness segment produces bulk raw sugar, specialty food grade sugars and molasses; produces and sells specialty food-grade sugars; provides general trucking services, mobile equipment maintenance and repair services; leases agricultural land to third parties; and generates and sells electricity to the extent not used in segment operations. The company was founded by Samuel Thomas Alexander and Henry Perrine Baldwin in 1870 and is headquartered in Honolulu, HI.
日経NEEDS
業種		総合デベロッパー、製糖、不動産リノベーション

基礎情報業績・財務情報ステークホルダー
基礎情報
会社名Alico, Inc.国籍United States
コード・
上場市場		ALCO NASISINUS0162301040
日経
会社コード		設立年1960
産業Process Industries業種Agricultural Commodities/Milling
本社所在地10070 Daniels Interstate Court, Suite 100, Fort Myers, Florida, 33913, United States従業員数128 人
URLhttp://www.alicoinc.com
事業内容
事業内容Alico, Inc. is an agribusiness and land management company. It is engaged in a variety of agribusiness pursuits, which include citrus production, sugarcane production and cattle ranching. The company operates its business through the following segments: Citrus Groves, Alico Fruit, Sugarcane, Cattle, Land Leasing & Rentals and Other Operations. The Citrus Groves segment includes activities related to planting, cultivating and/or managing citrus groves in order to produce fruit for delivery to fresh and processed citrus markets. The Alico Fruit segment includes activities related to the purchase and resale of fruit, as well as, to value-added services which include contracting for the harvesting, marketing and hauling of citrus. The Sugarcane segment includes activities related to planting, cultivating and/or managing sugarcane fields in order to produce sugarcane for sale to a sugar processor. The Cattle segment includes the production of beef cattle for sale. The Land Leasing & Rentals segment includes the leasing of land to others on a tenant-at-will basis for grazing, farming, oil and mineral exploration and recreational uses. The Other Operations segment includes activities related to rock mining royalties, oil exploration and other insignificant lines of business. Alico was founded on February 29, 1960 and is headquartered in Fort Myers, FL.
日経NEEDS
業種		農産・農産加工品

本社所在地7 Times Square Tower, 17th floor, New York, New York, 10036, United States従業員数2,067 人
URLhttp://www.alleghany.com
事業内容
事業内容Alleghany Corp. provides property, casualty reinsurance, insurance and financial services. It owns and manages operating subsidiaries and investments, anchored by a core position in property and casualty reinsurance and insurance. The company operates its business through two segments: Reinsurance and Insurance. The Reinsurance segment consists of property and casualty and other reinsurance operations. The Insurance segment consists of property and casualty insurance operations. Alleghany was founded by Oris Paxton Van Sweringen and Mantis James Van Sweringen in 1929 and is headquartered in New York, NY.

会社名Alliance HealthCare Services, Inc.国籍United States
コード・
上場市場		AIQ NASISINUS0186063014

会社コード		設立年1983
産業Health Services業種Medical/Nursing Services
本社所在地100 Bayview Circle, Suite 400, Newport Beach, California, 92660, United States従業員数1,582 人
URLhttp://www.alliancehealthcareservices-us.com
事業内容
事業内容Alliance HealthCare Services, Inc. provides outpatient diagnostic imaging and radiation oncology solutions. The company operates its business through two segments: Radiology and Radiation Oncology. The Radiology segment comprises of diagnostic imaging services including MRI, PET/CT and other imaging services. The Radiation Oncology segment is the medical practice of delivering radiation therapy under the direction of a radiation oncologist. The Radiation Oncology segment uses ionizing radiation to treat cancer. Alliance HealthCare Services was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Newport Beach, CA.

CPCD000BT9-E
基礎情報業績・財務情報ステークホルダー
基礎情報
会社名RegeneRx Biopharmaceuticals, Inc.国籍United States
コード・
上場市場		RGRX OTCISINUS75886X1081
日経
会社コード		設立年1982
産業Health Technology業種Biotechnology
本社所在地15245 Shady Grove Road, Suite 470, Rockville, Maryland, 20850, United States従業員数4 人
URLhttp://www.regenerx.com
事業内容
事業内容RegeneRx Biopharmaceuticals, Inc. is a biopharmaceutical company, which focuses on the development of a novel therapeutic peptide, Thymosin beta 4, or Tß4, for tissue and organ protection, repair, and regeneration. It has formulated Tß4 into three distinct product candidates in clinical development, such as RGN-259, RGN-352 and RGN-137. The company's RGN-259 is a preservative-free topical eye drop for regeneration of corneal tissues damaged by injury, disease or other pathology. Its RGN-352 is an injectable formulation to treat cardiovascular diseases, central and peripheral nervous system diseases, and other medical indications that may be treated by systemic administration. The RGN-137 is a topical gel for dermal wounds and reduction of scar tissue. Regenerx was founded by Allan L. Goldstein on May 13, 1982 and is headquartered in Rockville, MD.
日経NEEDS
業種		バイオベンチャー
財務諸表

基礎情報業績・財務情報ステークホルダー
基礎情報
会社名Skyworks Solutions, Inc.国籍United States
コード・
上場市場		SWKS NASISINUS83088M1027
日経
会社コード		設立年1962
産業Electronic Technology業種Semiconductors
本社所在地20 Sylvan Road, Woburn, Massachusetts, 01801, United States従業員数5,550 人
URLhttp://www.skyworksinc.com
事業内容
事業内容Skyworks Solutions, Inc. designs, develops, manufactures and markets proprietary semiconductor products. It supports automotive, broadband, cellular infrastructure, energy management, GPS, industrial, medical, military, wireless networking, smartphone and tablet applications. The company's portfolio includes amplifiers, attenuators, circulators, demodulators, detectors, diodes, directional couplers, front-end modules, hybrids, infrastructure RF subsystems, isolators, lighting and display solutions, mixers, modulators, optocouplers, optoisolators, phase shifters, PLLs/synthesizers/VCOs, power dividers/combiners, power management devices, receivers, switches and technical ceramics. Skyworks Solutions was founded in 1962 and is headquartered in Woburn, MA.

事業内容
事業内容Innovative Food Holdings, Inc. distributes perishable and specialty food products. 基礎情報業績・財務情報ステークホルダー
基礎情報
会社名Altera Corporation国籍United States
コード・
上場市場		ALTR NASISINUS0214411003
日経
会社コード		設立年1983
産業Electronic Technology業種Semiconductors
本社所在地101 Innovation Drive, San Jose, California, 95134, United States従業員数3,091 人
URLhttp://www.altera.com
事業内容
事業内容Altera Corp. is a global semiconductor company, which serves customers within the telecom and wireless, industrial automation, military and automotive, networking, computer and storage, and other vertical markets. It designs, manufactures, and markets a variety of products: Programmable logic devices (PLDs), which consist of field-programmable gate arrays (FPGAs) and complex programmable logic devices (CPLDs), are standard semiconductor integrated circuits, or chips, that the company's customers program to perform desired logic functions in their electronic systems; power system-on-chip devices (PowerSoCs), simplifies and drives the miniaturization of power circuitry typically found in the electronic systems, intellectual property (IP) cores, which can be licensed by customers to add standard functions to their PLD designs; and Proprietary development software operates on personal computers and engineering workstations, is used by customers to develop, compile, and verify their designs, and then program their designs into PLDs. The company was founded by Robert F. Hartmann, Michael Magranet, Paul Newhagen and James D. Sansbury in 1983 and is headquartered in San Jose, CA.

会社名USSPI Media, Inc.国籍United States
コード・

産業Commercial Services業種Advertising/Marketing Services
本社所在地428 East State Parkway, Suite 226, Schaumburg, Illinois, 60173, United States従業員数17 人
URLhttp://www.usspi.com
事業内容
事業内容USSPI Media, Inc. operate as a holding company, which through its subsidiaries, National Home Delivery, Inc. and InMarketSolution, Inc. National Home Delivery is a media agency in national digital and newspaper placement and provides turnkey digital offerings to a network of local media partners. InMarketSolution is a marketing company that provides advertising programs to automobile dealers throughout the United States. It provides program that includes a proprietary bundle of data, print, direct mail and a guaranteed tracking solution to automobile dealers, which results in the sale of individual automobiles. The company was founded on December 15, 1988 and is headquartered in Schaumburg, IL.

基礎情報業績・財務情報ステークホルダー
基礎情報
会社名Alcoa Inc.国籍United States
コード・
上場市場		AA NYSISINUS0138171014
日経
会社コード		設立年1888
産業Non-Energy Minerals業種Aluminum
本社所在地390 Park Avenue, New York, New York, 10022, United States従業員数59,000 人
URLhttp://www.alcoa.com
事業内容
事業内容Alcoa, Inc. engaged in lightweight metals engineering and manufacturing. Its products are used worldwide in aircraft, automobiles, commercial transportation, packaging, oil and gas, defense, and industrial applications. The company operates its business through four segments: Alumina, Primary Metals, Global Rolled Products and Engineered Products & Solutions. The Alumina segment consists of Alcoa's upstream operations and consists of the Company's worldwide refinery system, including the mining of bauxite, which is then refined into alumina. Alumina is mainly sold directly to internal and external smelter customers worldwide through agents, alumina traders, and distributors. The Primary Metals segment comprises of Alcoa's upstream operations and consists of the Company's worldwide smelter system. Primary Metals receives alumina, mostly from the Alumina segment, and produces primary aluminum used by Alcoa's fabricating businesses, as well as sold to external customers, aluminum traders, and commodity markets. The Global Rolled Products segment is involved in the production and sale of aluminum plate, sheet and foil. It includes rigid container sheet, which is sold directly to customers in the packaging and consumer market. The segment also includes sheet and plate used in the transportation, building and construction and distribution markets. The Engineered Products and Solutions segment is involved in the production and sale of titanium, aluminum and super alloy investment castings, hard alloy extrusions, forgings and fasteners, aluminum wheels, integrated aluminum structural systems and architectural extrusions. These products serve the aerospace, automotive, building and construction, commercial transportation, power generation and defense markets. Alcoa was founded by Charles Martin Hall on October 1, 1888 and is headquartered in New York, NY.
日経NEEDS
業種		アルミニウム圧延・プレス・ダイカスト

基礎情報業績・財務情報ステークホルダー
基礎情報
会社名Ambac Financial Group, Inc.国籍United States
コード・
上場市場		AMBC NASISINUS0231398845
日経
会社コード		設立年1991
産業Finance業種Specialty Insurance
本社所在地One State Street Plaza, New York, New York, 10004, United States従業員数175 人
URLhttp://www.ambac.com
事業内容
事業内容Ambac Financial Group, Inc. operates as a holding company that financial guarantees and financial services to clients in both the public and private sectors around the world. Ambac Assurance Corp. is its principal operating subsidiary. It operates through two business segments: Financial Guarantee and Financial Services. The Financial Guarantee segment provides financial guarantees for public finance, structured finance and other obligations. The Financial Services segment provides investment agreements, funding conduits, interest rate, total return and currency swaps, principally to clients of the financial guarantee business, which includes municipalities and other public entities, health care organizations, investor-owned utilities and asset-backed issuers. The company was founded on April 29, 1991 and is headquartered in New York.
日経NEEDS
業種		信用保証・再保険

基礎情報業績・財務情報ステークホルダー
基礎情報
会社名Hess Corporation国籍United States
コード・
上場市場		HES NYSISINUS42809H1077
日経
会社コード		設立年1920
産業Energy Minerals業種Oil & Gas Production
本社所在地1185 Avenue of the Americas, 40th floor, New York, New York, 10036-2601, United States従業員数3,045 人
URLhttp://www.hess.com
事業内容
事業内容Hess Corp. is engaged in the exploration and production of crude oil and natural gas as well as in refining and marketing refined petroleum products, natural gas and electricity. It operates business through two segments: Exploration and Production and Marketing and Refining. The Exploration and Production segment explores for, develops, produces, purchases, transports and sells crude oil and natural gas and these activities take place principally in Algeria, Australia, Azerbaijan, Brazil, Brunei, China, Denmark, Egypt, Equatorial Guinea, France, Ghana, Indonesia, the Kurdistan region of Iraq, Libya, Malaysia, Norway, Russia, Thailand, the United Kingdom and the United States. The Marketing and Refining segment manufactures refined petroleum products and purchases, markets and trades refined petroleum products, natural gas and electricity. It changed its name from Amerada Hess Corp. to Hess Corp. The company was founded by Leon Hess in 1920 and is headquartered in New York, NY.
日経NEEDS
業種		石油開発・精製・販売、天然ガス開発・精製・販売

基礎情報業績・財務情報ステークホルダー
基礎情報
会社名AMERCO国籍United States
コード・
上場市場		UHAL NASISINUS0235861004
日経
会社コード		設立年1945
産業Finance業種Finance/Rental/Leasing
本社所在地1325 Airmotive Way, Suite 100, Reno, Nevada, 89502, United States従業員数25,400 人
URLhttp://www.amerco.com
事業内容
事業内容AMERCO is engaged in the provision of moving and storage services through its subsidiary U-Haul International, Inc. It operates through the following segments: Moving and Storage, Property and Casualty Insurance, and Life Insurance. The Moving and Storage segment comprises of the rental of trucks, trailers, portable storage boxes, specialty rental items, and self-storage spaces. The Property and Casualty Insurance segment provides loss adjusting and claims handling for U-Haul through regional offices across North America. The Life Insurance segment provides life and health insurance products. The company was founded by Leonard Samuel Shoen and Anna Mary Carty Shoen in 1945 and is headquartered in Reno, NV.
日経NEEDS
業種		倉庫・物流サービス（一般）

CPCD000BWJ-E
基礎情報業績・財務情報ステークホルダー
基礎情報
会社名American Biltrite Inc.国籍United States
コード・
上場市場		ABLT OTCISINUS0245914066
日経
会社コード		設立年1908
産業Process Industries業種Industrial Specialties
本社所在地57 River Street, Suite 302, Wellesley Hills, Massachusetts, 02481-2097, United States従業員数
URLhttp://www.ambilt.com
事業内容
事業内容American Biltrite, Inc. produces resilient floor tile products and adhesive coated, pressure-sensitive papers and films. The company operates its business through the following segments: Tape Division, Jewelry and Canadian Division. The Tape Division segment produces adhesive-coated, pressure-sensitive papers and films used to protect material during handling or storage or to serve as a carrier for transferring decals or die-cut lettering. This segment also produces pressure sensitive tapes and adhesive products used for applications in the heating, ventilating and air conditioning, footwear, automotive, electrical and electronic industries. The Jewelry segment consists of the company's subsidiary K&M Associates LP, a national costume jewelry supplier to mass merchandisers and department stores. The Canadian Division, which consists of a wholly-owned Canadian subsidiary, American Biltrite (Canada) Ltd., a producer of flooring, rubber and other industrial products. The company was founded in 1908 and is headquartered in Wellesley Hills, MA.
日経NEEDS
業種		建築材料（床材・内装材）

基礎情報業績・財務情報ステークホルダー
基礎情報
会社名US Ecology, Inc.国籍United States
コード・
上場市場		ECOL NASISINUS91732J1025
日経
会社コード		設立年1952
産業Industrial Services業種Environmental Services
本社所在地251 East Front Street, Suite 400, Boise, Idaho, 83702, United States従業員数1,800 人
URLhttp://www.usecology.com
事業内容
事業内容US Ecology, Inc. is a radioactive and hazardous waste services company, which provides industrial waste management and recycling services to commercial and government entities, including refineries and chemical production facilities, manufacturers, electric utilities, steel mills, medical and academic institutions and waste brokers. It operates through two business segments: Environmental Services and Field & Industrial Services. The Environmental Services segment provides a broad range of hazardous material management services including the transportation, recycling, treatment and disposal of hazardous and non-hazardous waste at company-owned landfill, wastewater and other treatment facilities. The Field & Industrial Services segment provides packaging and collection of hazardous waste and total waste management solutions. It services include on-site management, waste characterization, transportation and disposal of non-hazardous and hazardous waste. The company was founded in 1952 and is headquartered in Boise, ID.
日経NEEDS
業種		廃棄物処理・リサイクル・環境衛生管理

CPCD000BY1-E
基礎情報業績・財務情報ステークホルダー
基礎情報
会社名American Electric Power Company, Inc.国籍United States
コード・
上場市場		AEP NYSISINUS0255371017
日経
会社コード		設立年1906
産業Utilities業種Electric Utilities
本社所在地1 Riverside Plaza, Columbus, Ohio, 43215-2373, United States従業員数
URLhttp://www.aep.com
事業内容
事業内容American Electric Power Co., Inc. is a public utility holding company that engages in the business of generation, transmission and distribution of electricity. It operates through following segments: Vertically Integrated Utilities, Transmission & Distribution Utilities, AEP Transmission Holdco, Generation & Marketing and AEP River Operations. The Vertically Integrated Utilities segment engages in the generation, transmission and distribution of electricity for sale to retail and wholesale customers through assets owned and operated by its subsidiaries. The Transmission & Distribution Utilities segment engages in the business of transmission and distribution of electricity for sale to retail and wholesale customers through assets owned and operated by its subsidiaries. The AEP Transmission Holdco segment engages in the development, construction and operation of transmission facilities through investments in its wholly-owned transmission subsidiaries and joint ventures. The Generation & Marketing segment engages in non-regulated generation; and marketing, risk management and retail activities. The AEP River Operations segment engages in the commercial barging operations that transports liquids, coal and dry bulk commodities primarily on the Ohio, Illinois and lower Mississippi Rivers. The company was founded on December 20, 1906 and is headquartered in Columbus, OH.
日経NEEDS
業種		電力供給サービス

CPCD000BY7-E
基礎情報業績・財務情報ステークホルダー
基礎情報
会社名American Express Company国籍United States
コード・
上場市場		AXP NYSISINUS0258161092
日経
会社コード		設立年1850
産業Finance業種Financial Conglomerates
本社所在地200 Vesey Street, 50th Floor, New York, New York, 10285-1000, United States従業員数54,000 人
URLhttp://www.americanexpress.com
事業内容
事業内容American Express Co. is a global payments and travel company. The company, through its subsidiaries, offers products and services, including charge and credit payment card products and travel-related services to consumers and businesses around the world. American Express operates through four reportable segments: U.S. Card Services, International Card Services, Global Commercial Services and Global Network & Merchant Services. The U.S. Card Services segment offers a wide range of card products and services to consumers and small businesses in the United States and provides travel services to card members and other customers. The International Card Services segment offers proprietary consumer and small business cards outside the United States. The Global Commercial Services segment provides expense management services to companies and organizations worldwide through its global corporate payments and global business travel businesses. Global corporate payments offer a range of expense management solutions to companies worldwide through its corporate card programs and Business-to-Business payment solutions. Global business travel provides globally integrated solutions, both online and offline, as well as through mobile applications, to help organizations manage and optimize their travel investments and service their traveling employees. The Global Network & Merchant services segment operates a global payments network that processes and settles proprietary and non-proprietary card transactions. It also provides point-of-sale products, multi-channel marketing programs and capabilities, services and data, leveraging the global closed-loop network. The company was founded by Henry Wells, William G. Fargo and John Warren Butterfield on March 28, 1850 and is headquartered in New York, NY.
日経NEEDS
業種		信販・クレジットカード
Ｍ＆Ａ事象

貸借対照表
科目金額(百万アメリカドル)
2013.122014.12
資産の部

基礎情報業績・財務情報ステークホルダー
基礎情報
会社名Healthways, Inc.国籍United States
コード・
上場市場		HWAY NASISINUS4222451001
日経
会社コード		設立年1981
産業Health Services業種Medical/Nursing Services
本社所在地701 Cool Springs Boulevard, Franklin, Tennessee, 37067, United States従業員数2,700 人
URLhttp://www.healthways.com
事業内容
事業内容Healthways, Inc. provides specialized, comprehensive solutions to help people improve physical, emotional and social well-being, reducing both direct healthcare costs and associated costs from the loss of employee productivity. The company through its Well-Being Improvement Services segment provides specific and personalized interventions for each individual in a population, irrespective of health status, age or payor. Its solutions are designed to keep healthy people healthy, mitigate or eliminate lifestyle risk factors that can lead to disease and optimize care for those with chronic illness. Healthways was founded by Stone E. Robert and Thomas G. Cigarran in 1981 and is headquartered in Franklin, TN.

基礎情報業績・財務情報ステークホルダー
基礎情報
会社名American International Group, Inc.国籍United States
コード・
上場市場		AIG NYSISINUS0268747849
日経
会社コード		設立年1919
産業Finance業種Multi-Line Insurance
本社所在地175 Water Street, New York, New York, 10038-4925, United States従業員数65,000 人
URLhttp://www.aig.com
事業内容
事業内容American International Group, Inc. operates as a global insurance company, which provides property casualty insurance, life insurance, retirement products, mortgage insurance and other financial services. Its offerings include products and services that help businesses and individuals protect their assets, manage risks and provide for retirement security. The company operates through two segments: Commercial Insurance and Consumer Insurance, and a corporate and other category. The Commercial Insurance has three operating segments: Property Casualty, Mortgage Guaranty and Institutional Markets. The Consumer Insurance also has three operating segments: Retirement, Life and Personal Insurance. American International Group was founded by Cornelius Vander Starr in 1919 and is headquartered in New York, NY.

基礎情報業績・財務情報ステークホルダー
基礎情報
会社名American Locker Group Incorporated国籍United States
コード・
上場市場		ALGI OTCISINUS0272841083
日経
会社コード		設立年1958
産業Producer Manufacturing業種Building Products
本社所在地2701 Regent Boulevard, Suite 200, Dallas, Texas, 75261, United States従業員数120 人
URLhttp://www.americanlocker.com
事業内容
事業内容American Locker Group, Inc. manufactures lockers, locks and keys with a wide-range of applications for use in numerous industries. It manufactures and services the key and lock system with the iconic plastic orange cap. The company through its subsidiaries, American Locker Security Systems, Inc. and Canadian Locker Co., Ltd., is engaged in the sale of lockers, including coin, key-only and electronically controlled checking lockers and related locks and aluminum centralized mail and parcel distribution mailboxes. Its products include recreation lockers, electronic distribution lockers, evidence locker, laptop lockers, mini-check lockers, coin operated keys and lock. Its services include private mail delivery mailboxes and contract manufacturing services. American Locker Group was founded on December 15, 1958 and is headquartered in DFW Airport, TX.
日経NEEDS
業種		建築材料（金属）

基礎情報業績・財務情報ステークホルダー
基礎情報
会社名American National Bankshares Inc.国籍United States
コード・
上場市場		AMNB NASISINUS0277451086
日経
会社コード		設立年1984
産業Finance業種Regional Banks
本社所在地628 Main Street, Danville, Virginia, 24541-1320, United States従業員数284 人
URLhttp://www.amnb.com
事業内容
事業内容American National Bankshares, Inc. operates as a bank holding company of American National Bank. It provides array of financial products and services, including commercial, mortgage, and consumer banking; trust and investment services; and insurance. The bank also provides online banking and telephone banking services. The company operates through the following segments: Community Banking and Trust and Investment Services. The Community Banking segment involves making loans to and generating deposits from individuals and businesses. The Trust and Investment Services segment include estate planning, trust account administration, investment management, and retail brokerage. Investment management services include purchasing equity, fixed income, and mutual fund investments for customer accounts. American National Bankshares was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Danville, VA.
日経NEEDS
業種		地方銀行

CPCD000C1F-E
基礎情報業績・財務情報ステークホルダー
基礎情報
会社名American Science and Engineering, Inc.国籍United States
コード・
上場市場		ASEI NASISINUS0294291077
日経
会社コード		設立年1958
産業Electronic Technology業種Aerospace & Defense
本社所在地829 Middlesex Turnpike, Billerica, Massachusetts, 01821, United States従業員数311 人
URLhttp://www.as-e.com
事業内容
事業内容American Science & Engineering, Inc. develops, manufactures, markets, and sells X-ray inspection and other detection products for homeland security, force protection and other critical defense and security applications. It manufactures sophisticated X-ray inspection products that can be used to inspect parcels, baggage, vehicles, pallets, cargo containers and people. The company's products and services are grouped into five different areas: cargo inspection systems, mobile cargo inspection systems, parcel and personnel screening inspection systems, custom products, and service & support. The cargo inspection Systems group includes non-intrusive inspection products that are primarily used for the screening of trucks, cars, cargo containers, pallets, and air cargo at locations, including border crossings, seaports, military bases, airports, and cargo and transportation hubs. The cargo inspection systems are designed to combat trade fraud, drug trafficking, weapons smuggling, and terrorism. The mobile cargo inspection systems include z backscatter van and zbv military trailer screening systems. The parcel and personnel screening inspection systems are designed for the non-intrusive X-ray scanning of parcels, baggage, and mail. These systems are primarily located in government facilities, airports, commercial office buildings, high-security federal facilities and convention centers. The custom products group engages in a variety of research and development programs, primarily for agencies of the U.S. government. The service & support provides technical support services worldwide. American Science & Engineering was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Billerica, MA.
日経NEEDS
業種		検査機器、検査機器

基礎情報業績・財務情報ステークホルダー
基礎情報
会社名American Shared Hospital Services国籍United States
コード・
上場市場		AMS ASEISINUS0295951059
日経
会社コード		設立年1980
産業Health Services業種Medical/Nursing Services
本社所在地Four Embarcadero Center, Suite 3700, San Francisco, California, 94111-4107, United States従業員数7 人
URLhttp://www.ashs.com
事業内容
事業内容American Shared Hospital Services provides Gamma Knife stereotactic radiosurgery equipment and radiation therapy and related equipment. The company, through its majority-owned subsidiary, GKF, provides Gamma Knife units to medical centers in the states of Arkansas, California, Connecticut, Florida, Illinois, Massachusetts, Mississippi, Nevada, New Jersey, New Mexico, New York, Tennessee, Oklahoma, Ohio, Texas and Wisconsin and in Turkey. The company also directly provides radiation therapy and related equipment, including intensity modulated radiation therapy, image guided radiation therapy and a CT simulator to the radiation therapy department at an existing Gamma Knife site in the U.S. American Shared Hospital Services was founded by Ernest A. Bates in June 1980 and is headquartered in San Francisco, CA.
日経NEEDS

基礎情報業績・財務情報ステークホルダー
基礎情報
会社名American Software, Inc. Class A国籍United States
コード・
上場市場		AMSWA NASISINUS0296831094
日経
会社コード		設立年1970
産業Technology Services業種Packaged Software
本社所在地470 East Paces Ferry Road NE, Atlanta, Georgia, 30305, United States従業員数402 人
URLhttp://www.amsoftware.com
事業内容
事業内容American Software, Inc. develops, markets and supports a portfolio of software and services that deliver enterprise management and collaborative supply chain solutions to the global marketplace. The company's software and services are designed to bring business value to enterprises by supporting their operations over intranets, extranets, client/servers or the Internet. It operates through the following segments: Supply Chain Management, Enterprise Resource Planning and Information Technology Consulting. The Supply Chain Management segment consists of Logility, Inc., which provides collaborative supply chain solutions to streamline and optimize the forecasting, production, supply, allocation, distribution and management of products between trading partners. The Enterprise Resource Planning segment consists of American Software ERP, which provides purchasing and materials management, customer order processing, financial, e-commerce and traditional manufacturing solutions; and New Generation Computing, which provides industry specific business software to both retailers and manufacturers in the apparel, sewn products and furniture industries. The Information Technology Consulting segment consists of The Proven Method, Inc., an IT staffing and consulting services firm, which provides support for its software products, such as software enhancements, documentation, updates, customer education, consulting, systems integration services and maintenance. American Software was founded by Thomas L. Newberry and James C. Edenfield in 1970 and is headquartered in Atlanta, GA.
日経NEEDS

会社名American Vanguard Corporation国籍United States
コード・
上場市場		AVD NYSISINUS0303711081

会社コード		設立年1969
産業Process Industries業種Chemicals: Agricultural
本社所在地4695 MacArthur Court, Suite 1250, Newport Beach, California, 92660, United States従業員数382 人
URLhttp://www.american-vanguard.com
事業内容
事業内容American Vanguard Corp. is a holding company which through its subsidiaries engages in manufacturing of agricultural chemicals. The company develops and markets products for crop protection and management, turf and ornamentals management and public and animal health.Its subsidiary, AMVAC Chemical Corp. manufactures and formulates chemicals for crops, human and animal health protection. Its products are marketed in liquid, powder, and granular forms. American Vanguard was founded by Herbert A. Kraft and Glenn A. Wintemute in January 1969 and is headquartered in Newport Beach, CA.

基礎情報業績・財務情報ステークホルダー
基礎情報
会社名American Woodmark Corporation国籍United States
コード・
上場市場		AMWD NASISINUS0305061097
日経
会社コード		設立年1980
産業Producer Manufacturing業種Building Products
本社所在地3102 Shawnee Drive, Winchester, Virginia, 22601, United States従業員数5,070 人
URLhttp://www.americanwoodmark.com
事業内容
事業内容American Woodmark Corp. manufactures and distributes kitchen cabinets and vanities for the remodeling and new home construction markets. The company manufactures cabinet under five major brands: American Woodmark, Shenandoah Cabinetry, Timberlake, Shenandoah Value Series, Timberlake Cabinetry and Waypoint Living Spaces. Its products are sold on a national basis directly to home centers, major builders and home manufacturers and through a network of independent dealers and distributors. It also provides complete turnkey installation services to its direct builder customers via its network of nine service centers that are strategically located throughout the United States. The company was founded by William F. Brandt, Jr., Al Graber, Jeff Holcomb and Don Mathias in 1980 and is headquartered in Winchester, VA.

業種		住宅設備（システムキッチン）
